articles.content: Mycologists in southern Africa have discovered the closest wild relative of domesticated magic mushrooms, revealing new insights into the genetic history of psychedelic fungi. Describing the new spec… [+3948 chars]

articles.title: Black hole jet crashes into an unidentified object - Earth.com
articles.description: Astronomers have discovered a unique black hole jet collision in the galaxy Centaurus A, producing a V-shaped X-ray emission.
articles.content:
Astronomers have uncovered a mysterious phenomenon involving a jet from a supermassive black hole that collided with an unidentified object in its path.
